wordpressPost.title: Florence + The Machine to headline 13th of August
wordpressPost.excerpt: New album and big festival shows for Florence Welch in 2015!
wordpressPost.content:
FLORENCE + THE MACHINE (UK) – Thursday 13th of August
CARIBOU (CA) – Wednesday 12th of August
FOXYGEN (US)
SIRI NILSEN

On Thursday 13th of August Florence + The Machine will headline our main stage Amfiet. This will be her first concert in Norway in three years, and the only one in 2015. Florence Welch has in a few years become a huge star across the world. A new album will be released next year, and expectations are gigantic. She’s coming to Oslo with a big show, so this is really something to look forward to.

Canadian artist Caribou is  known for his playful version of electronica, and has released one of 2014s best albums with Our Love. The Californian duo Foxygen will play in Oslo for the first time ever. We are looking forward to their modern version of elements from 60’s and 70’s rock. Siri Nilsen is a Norwegian singer/songwriter, who released her third album in 2014.
